item.title: Multi-modal Sports Video Summarization
item.description: Built a multi-modal pipeline using BERT and CNNs to detect and align important football moments from commentary and scoreboard video. Final output is a stitched highlight video. Fine-tuned BERT for audio commentary classification. Used image processing on scoreboard to extract goal/match events. Weighted timestamp fusion for final highlight stitching. item.title: Sentiment-Driven Stock Price Forecasting
item.description: This project involves scraping and curating daily news articles related to Tata Motors and analyzing the sentiment of each article using NLP models from Hugging Face. A Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) model was trained to forecast stock price movements based on these sentiments and historical data, revealing the impact of public sentiment on market behavior.

item.title: Inventory Management System
item.description: This inventory system was built with a microservices architecture using Flask and RabbitMQ for decoupled inter-service communication. Key services include health checks, item management, stock updates, and order handling. MongoDB was used for data persistence with full CRUD support. The entire system is containerized using Docker for seamless deployment across environments.

item.title: Vinhal
item.description: Vinhal is a basic machine learning library built in Rust and exposed to Python using PyO3 and Maturin. It helps understand ML internals and achieves 50%-90% faster training times than native Python implementations. Built without external dependencies. Exposes safe Python bindings via Rust. Trains models super fast.

item.title: Stock Trading Web-App
item.description: The app allows users to view real-time stock prices, buy/sell stocks, and track portfolio allocation using the IEX Cloud API. Full PERN stack application. Includes user auth, charts (Chart.js), and allocation tracking.

item.title: Restaurant Booking App
item.description: Users can reserve tables and manage bookings. Data is stored in MongoDB Atlas, and the UI is deployed via Vercel. Mobile-friendly design. Instant table booking. Modern frontend and backend stack.

item.title: Graduate Admission Predictor
item.description: This Streamlit app predicts the chances of a student getting admitted based on academic metrics like GRE, TOEFL, CGPA, and more. Uses linear regression from Scikit-learn. Clean UI and hosted app.

item.title: Tic Tac Toe (Socket Programming)
item.description: A network-based two-player Tic Tac Toe game using client-server architecture. Uses Python socket library. Easy to play over a local network.
